<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unassuming Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1015) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 44 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Access**
Uhlam ethnicity

</column>

---

Your family instilled the values of care and patience into you from a young age. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to perform a downtime activity.
name: Unassuming Dedication
